alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Greenwood; Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:09PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Laurens, eastern Anderson, northeastern Abbeville and northern Greenwood Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 109 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles north of Abbeville to 4 miles west of Greenwood. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Laurens, Honea Path, Ware Shoals, Gray Court, Cross Hill, Donalds, Cokesbury, Waterloo and Hodges. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
